name: Julian Torres
title: Open
coverLetter:
My name is Julian Torres and I am a very hard worker who can learn plenty and have lots in mind to contribute. I have worked at a grow house growing the product and curing it and drying it. I have also went around to shops to sell pounds to the shops. I can grow it and I can sell it. I try my best to stay faithful to my employers if they treat me with respect but if I'm not treated with respect I don't show respect and would quit because that's not the kind of environment I would want to work in. I am very friendly and nice and I enjoy helping people with things they need to get done. I have no problem doing any job. If it needs to get done and nobody else wants to do it or I can I will do it and I know I can succeed.


my number is 3236830016
additionalInfo: I'm a cook/chef and a general worker. I work on cars and I weld. I enjoy learning new things and seeing new better opportunities. I work hard and I work smart. I give it my all. I don't slack. I'm just trying to grow
